name: CoBa Adventure
description:
Your application as 'CoBa Keeper' has been accepted. You're supposed to meet on CoBa Island. So you pack up your stuff and head into the unknown.

Your first day as CoBa keeper... starts now!

Just don't ask what has happened to the previous one.

This is a puzzle Game where you have to bring at least on little CoBa *Color Ball* to the Goal Flag.

Thank You for playing and have Fun!

This is an entry for the GDFG's Monthly Game Jam #9

Used Tools..:
Music: MuseNet
Sound Effects: Audacity
Gfx: Gimp
